m_szDocTitle: Honda's fast-fill hydrogen station replenishes fuel cell cars in just 3 minutes
m_szDocSumamry: Honda’s fast-fill hydrogen station replenishes fuel cell cars in just 3 minutes March 7, 2014 | In: Charging & Refueling Leave a Comment The wheels of Honda’s attempt to make hydrogen a viable fuel for personal transport are turning ever-quicker with the unveiling of a new state-of-the-art refuelling station. Although operational the station – capable of storing hydrogen at a pressure of 10,000 psi – is more of a prototype for investigating refuelling procedure. It can refuel a hydrogen fuel cell car in less than three minutes, which is around 45 percent faster than a standard station. “In ord
